Read in bam file as a data.frame

Source: R/get_bam.R
bam_to_df.Rd

Read in bam file as a data.frame

Usage

bam_to_df(filename, region = NULL, tags = NULL)

Arguments

filename

path to bam file

region

samtools region query string (i.e. chr1:100-1000)

tags

bam tags to return, supplied with type suffix, i.e. "XS:A" for character, "AS:i" for integer, and "CB:Z" for string. Bam entries with missing tags will return empty strings.

Examples

bam_file <- system.file("extdata", "SRR5564277_Aligned.sortedByCoord.out.bam", package = "raer")
res <- bam_to_df(bam_file)
head(res)
#>   chrom start end               name strand
#> 1  SSR3     0 126  SRR5564277.775963      +
#> 2  SSR3     0 129  SRR5564277.936490      +
#> 3  SSR3     0 123 SRR5564277.1037281      +
#> 4  SSR3     0 123 SRR5564277.1252641      +
#> 5  SSR3     0  63 SRR5564277.2172388      +
#> 6  SSR3     0 125 SRR5564277.2528847      +

res <- bam_to_df(bam_file,
                 region = "DHFR:88-100",
                 tags = c("NH:i", "AS:i"))
res
#>    chrom start end               name strand NH  AS
#> 1   DHFR     0 142  SRR5564277.492430      +  1 285
